price: Taj dan oni koji su vjerovali nevjernicima će se podsmijavati,
arabic: فَٱلۡيَوۡمَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡكُفَّارِ يَضۡحَكُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fal-yawma alladhīna āmanū mina al-kufāri yaḍḥakūna
